title: Mathieu van der Poel is fresher, more relaxed, and primed for his ‘best Tour de France’
content:
Dutch ace chooses training over racing through late spring, and now he's raring to blitz the Tour de France and a road-MTB worlds double.

Read the full article at Mathieu van der Poel is fresher, more relaxed, and primed for his ‘best Tour de France’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
